description.zh-cn: 1932年4月2日由习仲勋等人在甘肃省两当县组织和发动的军事暴动，是中国共产党在第一次国共内战期间于中国西北地区领导的唯一一次武装兵变。
description.en: A military mutiny organized and launched by Xi Zhongxun and others in Liangdang County, Gansu Province on April 2, 1932. It was the only armed mutiny led by the Chinese Communist Party in Northwestern China during the First Kuomintang-Communist Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人，两当兵变的主要组织者和领导者之一。
description.en: A former major leader of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China, and one of the main organizers and leaders of the Liangdang Mutiny.

description.zh-cn: 两当兵变的参与者。
description.en: A participant in the Liangdang Mutiny.

description.zh-cn: 两当兵变的参与者。
description.en: A participant in the Liangdang Mutiny.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省份，两当兵变的发生地。
description.en: A province of the People's Republic of China, where the Liangdang Mutiny took place.

description.zh-cn: 甘肃省下辖的县，两当兵变的发生地。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Gansu Province, where the Liangdang Mutiny occurred.

description.zh-cn: 两当兵变发生的历史时期。
description.en: The historical period during which the Liangdang Mutiny occurred.

description.zh-cn: 领导两当兵变的政党。
description.en: The political party that led the Liangdang Mutiny.

nodes.id: 中国共产党陕西省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党陕西省委员会

description.zh-cn: 派遣习仲勋等人到杨虎城部队开展兵运工作的组织。
description.en: The organization that dispatched Xi Zhongxun and others to Yang Hucheng's troops to carry out military movement work.

description.zh-cn: 受中共陕西省委派遣开展兵运工作，并参与组织发动两当兵变。
description.en: Dispatched by the Shaanxi Provincial Committee of the CCP to carry out military movement work and participated in organizing and launching the Liangdang Mutiny.

description.zh-cn: 受中共陕西省委派遣到杨虎城部队开展兵运工作。
description.en: Dispatched by the Shaanxi Provincial Committee of the CCP to Yang Hucheng's troops to carry out military movement work.

description.zh-cn: 国民革命军将领，时任第十七路军总指挥。
description.en: A general of the National Revolutionary Army, commander of the 17th Route Army at the time.

description.zh-cn: 杨虎城领导的部队，两当兵变发生在其下属的警备第三旅二团一营。
description.en: The army led by Yang Hucheng; the Liangdang Mutiny occurred in its subordinate 1st Battalion, 2nd Regiment, 3rd Garrison Brigade.

description.zh-cn: 两当兵变的组织者和发动者之一。
description.en: One of the organizers and launchers of the Liangdang Mutiny.

description.zh-cn: 两当兵变的组织者和发动者之一。
description.en: One of the organizers and launchers of the Liangdang Mutiny.

description.zh-cn: 两当兵变的组织者和发动者之一，后任中国工农红军陕甘游击队第五支队支队长。
description.en: One of the organizers and launchers of the Liangdang Mutiny, later served as the commander of the Fifth Detachment of the Shaanxi-Gansu Guerrilla Force of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army.

en: Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在第一次国共内战时期的主要武装力量。
description.en: The main armed force of the Chinese Communist Party during the First Kuomintang-Communist Civil War.

nodes.id: 中国工农红军陕甘游击队第五支队

zh-cn: 中国工农红军陕甘游击队第五支队

description.zh-cn: 由两当兵变部队改编而成的红军游击队。
description.en: A Red Army guerrilla detachment formed from the troops of the Liangdang Mutiny.

description.zh-cn: 陕西省咸阳市下辖县，中国工农红军陕甘游击队第五支队在此地被打散。
description.en: A county under Xianyang, Shaanxi Province, where the Fifth Detachment of the Shaanxi-Gansu Guerrilla Force of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army was dispersed.

description.zh-cn: 在永寿县岳御寺包围并打散中国工农红军陕甘游击队第五支队的土匪头目。
description.en: The bandit leader who surrounded and dispersed the Fifth Detachment of the Shaanxi-Gansu Guerrilla Force of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army at Yueyu Temple in Yongshou County.

description.zh-cn: 作为主要领导者之一，组织和发动了两当兵变。
description.en: As one of the main leaders, he organized and launched the Liangdang Mutiny.

description.zh-cn: 参与组织和发动两当兵变。
description.en: Participated in organizing and launching the Liangdang Mutiny.

description.zh-cn: 参与组织和发动两当兵变。
description.en: Participated in organizing and launching the Liangdang Mutiny.

description.zh-cn: 参与组织和发动两当兵变。
description.en: Participated in organizing and launching the Liangdang Mutiny.

description.zh-cn: 参与组织和发动两当兵变。
description.en: Participated in organizing and launching the Liangdang Mutiny.

description.zh-cn: 两当兵变是在中国共产党的领导下发生的。
description.en: The Liangdang Mutiny occurred under the leadership of the Chinese Communist Party.

relationships.source: 中国共产党陕西省委员会

description.zh-cn: 秘密派遣习仲勋到杨虎城第十七路军开展兵运工作，为两当兵变做准备。
description.en: Secretly dispatched Xi Zhongxun to Yang Hucheng's 17th Route Army to carry out military movement work in preparation for the Liangdang Mutiny.

relationships.source: 中国共产党陕西省委员会

description.zh-cn: 秘密派遣李特生到杨虎城第十七路军开展兵运工作，为两当兵变做准备。
description.en: Secretly dispatched Li Tesheng to Yang Hucheng's 17th Route Army to carry out military movement work in preparation for the Liangdang Mutiny.

relationships.source: 中国共产党陕西省委员会

description.zh-cn: 秘密派遣李秉荣到杨虎城第十七路军开展兵运工作。
description.en: Secretly dispatched Li Bingrong to Yang Hucheng's 17th Route Army to carry out military movement work.

description.zh-cn: 在第十七路军内秘密开展兵运工作。
description.en: Secretly carried out military movement work within the 17th Route Army.

description.zh-cn: 第十七路军由杨虎城指挥。
description.en: The 17th Route Army was commanded by Yang Hucheng.

relationships.target: 中国工农红军陕甘游击队第五支队

description.zh-cn: 两当兵变的部队被改编为中国工农红军陕甘游击队第五支队。
description.en: The troops from the Liangdang Mutiny were reorganized into the Fifth Detachment of the Shaanxi-Gansu Guerrilla Force of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army.

relationships.target: 中国工农红军陕甘游击队第五支队
中国工农红军陕甘游击队第五支队

position.en: Party Committee Secretary of the Detachment

relationships.source: 中国工农红军陕甘游击队第五支队

relationships.target: 中国工农红军陕甘游击队第五支队

description.zh-cn: 在永寿县岳御寺包围并打散了该支队。
description.en: Surrounded and dispersed the detachment at Yueyu Temple in Yongshou County.

description.zh-cn: 在两当兵变前夕，与刘书林等人合影纪念。
description.en: Took a commemorative photo with Liu Shulin and others on the eve of the Liangdang Mutiny.

description.zh-cn: 在两当兵变前夕，与刘尚志等人合影纪念。
description.en: Took a commemorative photo with Liu Shangzhi and others on the eve of the Liangdang Mutiny.
